overview: The cute and unassuming girl-next-door know as Juli Ashton, has a few tricks up her garter in this, the first collection of her hottest scenes – and a brand new orgy scene shot to the exacting standards of Juli's own naughty little fantasy. Interviews with Juli reveal her favorite XXX features, as well as never-before-told tales of her past – and her direction for the future.
title: Deep Inside Juli Ashton
